column5: Well it,s not the greatest news Im afraid.The cancer is at stage three and with luck and prayers the radiation and kemo will cure it.If not,they will have to operate and that is where the worst news comes in.They will remove her voice box.Sorry I didnt have better news,but I owe to those that are thinking and praying for her.  Thanks again for the prayers.  Brian
So sorry to hear that B.  That is not good news at all.  Both options suck really  I'll keep good thoughts going for her.  Thanks for the update and let us know what happens.  Joey

Not the best news Brian, nor what you were wanting to hear, but if it helps you at all, one of my oldest and closest friends had the same operation about 15 years and ago and is now healthy and living life to the fullest.  Best of luck to your aunt, Bud.
Continued support for you and your Aunt Brian... I hope all goes well. HH
Godspeed and best of luck and a speedy recovery to your aunt. I pray she'll get through it.
Sorry to hear that Brian...  Our thoughts are with you!!
You're right Brian, not the news we were hoping for....but as Lew said, the surgery can be successful so don't lose hope yet!  Maureen
I am sorry to hear about your Aunt's battle.  I believe in the Power of Prayer.  Sometimes it's all we have and yet it's all we need.  She is in my prayers.
